title: Robots of Mars - The Robot Factory: Part 1
description: PART 1 – In this first adventure, Sparky is created in Mad Doctor’s Lab and sent on a mission to the robot factory to test his newfound skills. It is here in the robot factory where Sparky meets the Supervisor’s henchmen, Lurker and Gor. During the encounter, Sparky must outwit the Supervisor’s minions and escape before they can capture him. Will Sparky make it out of the Robot Factory alive? Find out!
author: Don  Fox
